type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Rapier[/i] – Eirika, Kingdomless Princess can't be blocked by creatures with toughness 2 or less.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Eirika deals combat damage to a player, untap a land you control.
[i]Convoy[/i] – {2}: Return target noncreature permanent you control to your hand.
